sentences.sentence: OBJECTIVE To analyze the causes and features of electronystagmography (ENG) in middle and elder aged vertigo patients.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨中老年眩晕患者的致病原因及眼震电图特点。

sentences.sentence: AIM To investigate the change of electronystagmography (ENG) in sleep apnea syndrome (SAS) patients and its clinical significance.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨睡眠呼吸暂停综合征(SAS)患者的眼震电图(eng)改变及临床意义。

sentences.sentence: With electronystagmography (ENG), various tests were carried out in 16 patients of congenital and 10 patients of acquired nystagmus.
sentences.translation: 应用眼震电流描记术，对16例先天性和10例后天性眼球震颤患者进行了多项试验检查。
